Doowop

A faster version of Doo Wop (see rock-128 for an alternative). This is in 4/4 and is good for songs around 180 bpm. This was written for "Book Of Love".

  • DooWop
  • DooWopSus
  • DooWopPlus
  • DooWopSusPlus
  • DooWopIntro
  • DooWopIntroSus
  • DooWopFill
  • DooWopEnd

DooWop

Basic DooWop. (4)
Bass FretlessBass
Chord Piano1
Drum-Clap HandClap
Drum-Hh OpenHiHat
Drum-Kick KickDrum1

DooWopSus

Add in sustained strings and voices. (4)
Bass FretlessBass
Chord Piano1
Chord-Sus TremoloStrings
Chord-Susharmony ChoirAahs
Drum-Clap HandClap
Drum-Hh OpenHiHat
Drum-Kick KickDrum1

DooWopPlus

Add some piano notes for interest. (4)
Arpeggio Piano1
Bass FretlessBass
Chord Piano1
Drum-Clap HandClap
Drum-Hh OpenHiHat
Drum-Kick KickDrum1

DooWopSusPlus
